title: Can a water pump be used for a garden hose? I use a trash water pump to run my sprinkler off-grid.

tasks.task: Setting up a two-inch trash pump from Harbor Freight to a normal sprinkler system using a hose adapter.
subtasks: Acquiring necessary fittings (two-inch female coupler, reducers, three-quarter-inch PVC pipe, and adapters).
Connecting the two-inch hose to the Harbor Freight trash pump adapter.
Attaching the PVC pipe and nozzle to the appropriate fittings.
Testing the system with water flow and pressure.
Verifying the system's functionality without pump modifications or bypass valves.
